description: This Kotlin source file defines a Fragment subclass named PrototypeOneFragment, which serves as a stub screen for Prototype 1 in an Android application. It includes a companion object with a factory method for creating instances and overrides onCreateView to inflate a specific layout resource.

classes.name: PrototypeOneFragment
classes.description: A Fragment subclass representing a stub screen for Prototype 1, providing a static factory method and inflating a layout.

methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of PrototypeOneFragment.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Overrides the Fragment's method to inflate and return the fragment's layout view.
